languages.text: "Если же ищете товаров для развлечения, найдите Октавиану в заведении "Адептус Амасекус". Химическая радость, которую она сможет вам предоставить, рафинирована и обладает удовлетворительной степенью чистоты. Только не просите наливать вам фирменного — оно рассчитано на ординарную футфольскую шваль, а не взыскательных клиентов".

traits.locale_text: "Если захотите приобрести оружие, человеку вашего статуса имеет смысл говорить только с Дядюшкой Райнхальдом, главой Гильдии Оружейников. Он торгует в атриуме, но не ждите многого от его товаров — большая часть его клиентуры не так взыскательна, как вы. Если же ищете товаров для развлечения, найдите Октавиану в заведении "Адептус Амасекус". Химическая радость, которую она сможет вам предоставить, рафинирована и обладает удовлетворительной степенью чистоты. Только не просите наливать вам фирменного — оно рассчитано на ординарную футфольскую шваль, а не взыскательных клиентов".

languages.text: "If you're looking for goods that can entertain you, find Octaviana at the establishment called the Adeptus Amasecus. The chemical bliss that she offers is refined and possesses a satisfactory degree of purity. Just don't ask her to pour you her signature drink — it's meant for common Footfall rabble, not discerning clientele."
languages.original_text: "Если же ищете товаров для развлечения, найдите Октавиану в заведении "Адептус Амасекус". Химическая радость, которую она сможет вам предоставить, рафинирована и обладает удовлетворительной степенью чистоты. Только не просите наливать вам фирменного — оно рассчитано на ординарную футфольскую шваль, а не взыскательных клиентов".

traits.locale_text: "If you want to buy weapons, it would only make sense for a figure of your rank to speak to Uncle Reinheld, head of the Armorers' Guild. He sells in the atrium, but don't expect much from his wares — most of his clients aren't as sophisticated as you are. If you're looking for goods that can entertain you, find Octaviana at the establishment called the Adeptus Amasecus. The chemical bliss that she offers is refined and possesses a satisfactory degree of purity. Just don't ask her to pour you her signature drink — it's meant for common Footfall rabble, not discerning clientele."

"If you want to buy weapons, it would only make sense for a figure of your rank to speak to Uncle Reinheld, head of the Armorers' Guild. If you're looking for goods that can entertain you, find Octaviana at the establishment called the Adeptus Amasecus. The chemical bliss that she offers is refined and possesses a satisfactory degree of purity. Just don't ask her to pour you her signature drink — it's meant for common Footfall rabble, not discerning clientele."

The chemical bliss that she offers is refined and possesses a satisfactory degree of purity. Just don't ask her to pour you her signature drink — it's meant for common Footfall rabble, not discerning clientele."

languages.text: 「楽しめる品をお探しなら、アデプトゥス・アマセックという店でオクタヴィアナを見つけるといい。彼女が出す至福の化学物質は洗練されていて、純度も申し分ない。ただ、彼女の特製ドリンクは頼まないように。舌の肥えた常連用じゃなくて、そこら辺にいるフットフォールの荒くれ者向けの代物だ」
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for goods that can entertain you, find Octaviana at the establishment called the Adeptus Amasecus. The chemical bliss that she offers is refined and possesses a satisfactory degree of purity. Just don't ask her to pour you her signature drink — it's meant for common Footfall rabble, not discerning clientele."

traits.locale_text: 「楽しめる品をお探しなら、アデプトゥス・アマセックという店でオクタヴィアナを見つけるといい。彼女が出す至福の化学物質は洗練されていて、純度も申し分ない。ただ、彼女の特製ドリンクは頼まないように。舌の肥えた常連用じゃなくて、そこら辺にいるフットフォールの荒くれ者向けの代物だ」

languages.text: “如果您打算找些自娱自乐的东西，可以去一家名叫‘艾玛赛克烈酒修会’的酒吧，找奥克塔维娜。她可以提供精致的化学极乐体验，让您体验毫无杂质的满足。不过，千万别喝她的招牌酒，那是给落脚港的平头百姓喝的酒，并不是给口味挑剔的顾客准备的。”
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for goods that can entertain you, find Octaviana at the establishment called the Adeptus Amasecus. The chemical bliss that she offers is refined and possesses a satisfactory degree of purity. Just don't ask her to pour you her signature drink — it's meant for common Footfall rabble, not discerning clientele."

traits.locale_text: “如果您打算找些自娱自乐的东西，可以去一家名叫‘艾玛赛克烈酒修会’的酒吧，找奥克塔维娜。她可以提供精致的化学极乐体验，让您体验毫无杂质的满足。不过，千万别喝她的招牌酒，那是给落脚港的平头百姓喝的酒，并不是给口味挑剔的顾客准备的。”

languages.text: «Si lo que busca es entretenimiento, pregunte por Octaviana en un local llamado el Adeptus Amasecus. El licor químico que ofrece es refinado y posee un más que digno índice de pureza. Eso sí, no le pidas que le sirva su bebida estrella; esa es para el vulgo de Paso, no para los paladares más exigentes».
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for goods that can entertain you, find Octaviana at the establishment called the Adeptus Amasecus. The chemical bliss that she offers is refined and possesses a satisfactory degree of purity. Just don't ask her to pour you her signature drink — it's meant for common Footfall rabble, not discerning clientele."

traits.locale_text: «Si lo que busca es entretenimiento, pregunte por Octaviana en un local llamado el Adeptus Amasecus. El licor químico que ofrece es refinado y posee un más que digno índice de pureza. Eso sí, no le pidas que le sirva su bebida estrella; esa es para el vulgo de Paso, no para los paladares más exigentes».

languages.text: « Si vous êtes plutôt en quête de divertissement, allez voir Octaviana dans l'établissement que l'on appelle l'Adeptus Amasecus. Elle propose à ses clients une extase chimique des plus raffinées, avec un degré de pureté tout à fait satisfaisant. En revanche, ne lui demandez pas de vous servir sa spécialité... Elle est destinée au petit peuple de Castel, pas à sa clientèle avertie. »
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for goods that can entertain you, find Octaviana at the establishment called the Adeptus Amasecus. The chemical bliss that she offers is refined and possesses a satisfactory degree of purity. Just don't ask her to pour you her signature drink — it's meant for common Footfall rabble, not discerning clientele."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous êtes plutôt en quête de divertissement, allez voir Octaviana dans l'établissement que l'on appelle l'Adeptus Amasecus. Elle propose à ses clients une extase chimique des plus raffinées, avec un degré de pureté tout à fait satisfaisant. En revanche, ne lui demandez pas de vous servir sa spécialité... Elle est destinée au petit peuple de Castel, pas à sa clientèle avertie. »

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr Waren zu Eurer Unterhaltung sucht, besucht Octaviana in ihrem Etablissement, dem Adeptus Amasecus. Der chemische Segen, den sie serviert, ist raffiniert und von ausreichender Reinheit. Aber fragt nicht nach ihrem Hausgetränk – es ist für gewöhnlichen Footfall-Pöbel ohne Geschmacksknospen."
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for goods that can entertain you, find Octaviana at the establishment called the Adeptus Amasecus. The chemical bliss that she offers is refined and possesses a satisfactory degree of purity. Just don't ask her to pour you her signature drink — it's meant for common Footfall rabble, not discerning clientele."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr Waren zu Eurer Unterhaltung sucht, besucht Octaviana in ihrem Etablissement, dem Adeptus Amasecus. Der chemische Segen, den sie serviert, ist raffiniert und von ausreichender Reinheit. Aber fragt nicht nach ihrem Hausgetränk – es ist für gewöhnlichen Footfall-Pöbel ohne Geschmacksknospen."

languages.text: "Keyif verici ürünler arıyorsanız Adeptus Amasekus adlı müessesede Octaviana'yı bulun. Sunduğu kimyasal mutluluk, rafine edilmiş olup tatmin edici bir saflık derecesine sahiptir. Özel içkisinden koymasını istemeyin yeter. O şey, seçiçi müşterilerden ziyade Binliman avamı içindir."
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for goods that can entertain you, find Octaviana at the establishment called the Adeptus Amasecus. The chemical bliss that she offers is refined and possesses a satisfactory degree of purity. Just don't ask her to pour you her signature drink — it's meant for common Footfall rabble, not discerning clientele."

traits.locale_text: "Keyiflendirici ürünler arıyorsanız Adeptus Amasekus adlı tesiste Octaviana'yı bulun. Sunduğu kimyasal mutluluk rafine edilmiştir ve tatmin edici bir saflık derecesine sahiptir. Özel içkisinden koymasını istemeyin yeter. O şey sıradan Binliman avamı içindir, seçici müşterilere göre değil."
